room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: We've done 3 different rooms here. The staff is fun and helpful. This is our favorite escape room- we've done them at 4 other locations. Varying difficulty. Prison Break is super hard, but we escaped the other two we did.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: My wife and I love these Escape in 60 minutes games and have done quite a few. This escape room is located in downtown Austin within walking distance of many hotels. We did the Prison Break game, and I have to say it was very good. Unfortunately, I can't say what I liked most about it, as that would give it away, but it compares as the top 2 of the 10 or so Escape rooms I've done. It's meant for a group of 5-7 people. If you've never done a game like this before, I strongly recommend it: it's a great way to get to know people (like your daughter's new boyfriend, for instance).

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: Flippin' wonderful! I'd give it 10 stars if possible! The staff was absolutely fantastic, helpful, and energetic. I will be back next time I come through Austin. Thanks TEG, for the great times!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: Definitely felt like I was in the movie SAW literally playing a jigsaw puzzle in a locked up room ! I felt like a kid again trying to figure out the clues with a group of friends ... Best fun experience of my life Big thanks to The Escape Game staff for letting us experience it first !

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: It was a super fun experience! It was fun looking for the clues in the rooms! I'd definitely do it again!
